titleStmt.title: Fatall prudence, or, Democrates, the unfortunate heroe a novell / translated out of French.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Bennet for R. Bentley and M. Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of an unidentified work in French.
First English ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Pages 8-9, 75-76 and 169 are stained; pages 166-193 are faded and have print show-through in filmed copy. Pages 160-end photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
